alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 11:59AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Nassau, Camden, southeastern Ware and northeastern Charlton Counties through 1245 PM EST... At 1159 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Homeland to 10 miles north of Taylor. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Callahan, Kings Bay Base, Homeland, Kings Ferry and High Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware
